entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border.
